recipe.title: Minty Meatballs
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds lean ground beef (85 percent lean)
1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped, plus more for garnish
instructions: In a bowl, mix together all ingredients until combined. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 1 hour, up to 24 hours. Heat oven to 425°F. Form meat mixture into 24 oval balls (about 3 tablespoons each). Arrange on 2 cookie sheets lined with parchment paper. Bake 8 minutes; turn and bake 10 minutes more. Garnish with parsley if desired; serve.
